items.title: EXCLUSIVE TWITCH PRIME BYTE OPERATOR SET - YING AVAILABLE NOW
items.abstract: Starting today, July 6th, claim your exclusive Operator Set free with Twitch Prime.
items.content:
Complete your collection with the Byte Operator set for Ying! Starting today, July 6th, claim your exclusive Operator Set free with Twitch Prime. With an all new uniform, headgear, weapon skin and charm, kit her out in the latest gear in Rainbow Six Siege. This offer is only available until August 6th so claim today!

__Ying Operator Set Includes:__
- Terminal Framework Uniform
- Terminal Program Headgear
- Datum Processor Weapon Skin
- Aegis Candela Charm
 
Claim your drop at the link below free with Twitch Prime, which is included with Amazon Prime membership, and offers free trials for new users:

How to claim your Twitch Prime Packs:
- Activate Twitch Prime by linking your Amazon Prime and Twitch accounts.
- Link your Twitch Prime and Ubisoft accounts [https://twitch.amazon.com/prime/loot/rainbow6siege](https://twitch.amazon.com/prime/loot/rainbow6siege)
- Visit the Twitch Prime rewards page [https://www.twitch.tv/prime](https://www.twitch.tv/prime)
- Log in to your Twitch account.
- Verify your linked accounts.
- Receive your Twitch Prime packs automatically in game! You will be able to find them in the Alpha Packs menu.
 
### FAQ

__Can I get the Twitch Prime Packs with Renown or R6 Credits?__

The Twitch Prime Collection is exclusive to Twitch Prime and can only be obtained from Twitch Prime drops.

__Do I have to have Twitch Prime?__

Yes, a Twitch Prime membership is required to receive Twitch Prime rewards - Twitch Prime is included free with Amazon Prime, and free trials are available for new users.

__Is this for all platforms?__

Yes, it can be redeemed on all platforms.

__I don’t see my rewards.__

If you're having trouble redeeming your Twitch Prime packs, please contact support (support.ubi.com).

For more information about Twitch Prime, visit the [Twitch Prime FAQ](help.twitch.tv/customer/en/portal/articles/2934707-twitch-prime-program-faq).

To redeem, must own Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege, link Ubisoft and Twitch Prime Accounts, and claim each drop between 5/4/20 and 8/6/20. ONLY SOME IN-GAME ITEMS AVAILABLE AT PROMOTION LAUNCH; ITEMS ONLY AVAILABLE DURING CLAIM WINDOWS. Must own operators to use in-game items. Final content/release dates subject to change. Content may be available separately after promotion. Valid in wherever Twitch Prime is available. Limit 1 per account. Restrictions apply. Void where prohibited.
